title: so there's an "undertale sucks," circlejerk going on, eh?
body:
i think this calls for a time to discuss and list the worst/best circlejerks that have happened ever since this forum/boards/whatever you want to call it existed

just for memories n giggles

or not if it's something (sadly) recent like the "cass isn't a poison mage pls buff," circlejerk

let's try and forget those exist :^)
